title: Kog feels weak.
body: Even at late game, he feels weak. His w just feels underwhelming. Am I the only one? :(

replies.body: Sadly they are also decreasing Ad ratio on W

> [{quoted}](name=Da BoSs1001,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=Hg7kK2YQ,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-11-13T22:49:11.414+0000)
>
> Sadly they are also decreasing Ad ratio on W

Decreasing? They're buffing it from 1.25% per 100 AD to 1.5% per 100 AD on top of buffing his base AS from .626 to .665, meaning AS will be more effective, and his base AD is increased from 54 to 57. 

"Kog'Maw
Base AD up to 57.46 from 54.46
Base attack speed to 0.665 from 0.625
Bio-Arcane Barrage (W) [ total AD ratio increased to 1.5% per 100 AD from 1.25%]" -From Surrender@20.
nvm must have read it wrong

I should ask who you were against.

If it was Cait then I feel you... Once she gets her traps she wins every lane and all you have to do is hoping she messes up with positioning and doesn't land a single headshot on you.

I only played Kog once and it was against a Lucian. I was getting zoned. I'm not an adc main either so I was getting stomped. But even then, other Kogs I've seen haven't done great either. I haven't seen an efficient Kog yet. His w is almost a trap to use.
Well it looks like Kog needs to gain a decent advantage with pure poke before going in W for the kill.
Kog doesn't have good poke though. His R doesn't do much unless they're low on health and his Q+E don't do much as a whole unless he's AP.

Check the PBE changes. He's getting small buffs. Due to the high attack rate, they wanted to keep him toned down but now with him showing signs of being quite the opposite of powerful, he's getting small buffs.

a) he relies on teamwork to some extend
b) he´s a lategame champ and games donßt last longer than 30min atm

-> sure he feels weak atm, doesn´t mean he isn´t still the king of lategame-dmg (if riot ever allows for lategame to be a thing again)
really? When i saw him he melted everybody
Call me crazy, but I love the new Kog changes. He is my fav ADC.

Yeah his range is pretty lacking considering his ult range. Not only is his AA range small comparatively, say Caitlyn for example her ult range is very far and as such her AA range. Cog' got the short end of the stick and his kit offers **NO MOBILITY **. I would suggest playing other ADCs if you want to be more successful. May the love for Cog' live on!
His w is almost a trap to use. I rather just forget I have a w to use. Cait is a better version.
He's always gonna be weak in Solo queue because the immense amount of pressure he puts on your team to take care of him.
He's getting buffed. Riot agrees with you.
his W, base ad and base AS are all being buffed next patch

He seems rather underwhelming, alright... Haven't played him myself, but he's definitely not as overpowered as the other adcs that had reworks. Out of 5 games I've had with a Kog on my team, I only won once.
